name: apod
description: NASA's Astronomy Picture of the Day

name: iss
description: Displays the current location of the International Space Station as well as its inhabitants

name: epic
description: Returns images collected by DSCOVR's Earth Polychromatic Imaging Camera (EPIC) instrument

options.name: enhanced
options.description: Returns enhanced images collected by DSCOVR's Earth Polychromatic Imaging Camera (EPIC) instrument

options.name: newest
options.description: If true, it shows the most recent image. Otherwise, it shows a random image.

options.name: natural
options.description: Returns natural images collected by DSCOVR's Earth Polychromatic Imaging Camera (EPIC) instrument

options.name: newest
options.description: If true, it shows the most recent image. Otherwise, it shows a random image.
